subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The Yankees must offer their former ace at least $4 million, or 80 percent of his $5 million salary in 2009, more than they would want for a pitcher who had shoulder surgery in July.
snippet: The Yankees must offer their former ace at least $4 million, or 80 percent of his $5 million salary in 2009, more than they would want for a pitcher who had shoulder surgery in July.
